data.title: Stewart Entertainment
data.meta_description: Top Rated Booking / Talent Agency out of Nashville, TN working with a variety of National and International Touring Acts in Funk, Soul, Rock & Roll, Reggae, Blues, Americana and more.
data.text:
Brad Stewart and the staff at Stewart Entertainment have partnered up to give the music industry what it needs the most. Honest, ethical, hard work, strategies, contacts, opportunities, and passionate professionals that help artists achieve their goals.

The purpose of Stewart Entertainment is to provide all the essential services an artist needs to succeed under one umbrella. We have developed a unique business model combining our expertise in booking, publishing, management, and publicity, in order to offer artists a full-service, boutique agency experience. Utilizing our strong relationships with writers, publicists, booking agencies, labels, artists, critics, publishers, managers, talent buyers, and distribution outlets across the country, we can efficiently coordinate and manage all the details in marketing, touring, merchandise, licensing, synchronization, production, and many other music business-related functions.

We offer consulting services, a variety of marketing services, publishing, management, and booking for some of the best talents on the scene today. With this solid foundation of support in place, our artists can focus on creating the music.

Stewart Entertainment offers front-to-back support that prides itself on an individual and thorough marketing strategy designed to highlight and articulate each client’s vision – allowing artists to pursue their creative paths while assisting them in cultivating and maximizing their capabilities. Our love and extensive knowledge of music allow us to augment artists’ potential by providing maximum exposure across the industry and efficiently managing every step of the way. Partnering with an experienced and knowledgeable company with an established track record often means the difference between being recognized – or not. Our ability to foster relationships between artists and other crucial aspects of the industry allows us to put our clients and their talents front and center.

​

​

Stewart Entertainment Agency's Team:

​

Sunshine Osborn: Sunshine@StewartEntertainment.net - Sunshine is a musician and an avid music enthusiast who has devoted much of her life to composing, performing, and recording. She also enjoys recreational activities like hiking, exercising, and playing tennis. Sunshine is deeply passionate about all aspects of the sonic arts and holds a firm belief that music is healing and helps to break the barriers that separate humanity. A few bands that she keeps on repeat are Phish, Steely Dan, String Cheese Incident, Gorillaz, Cory Wong and The Wongnotes, Talking Heads, Masayoshi Takanaka, Bela Fleck and the Flecktones, MGMT, and Mezzoforte -

Laura Estabridis: Laura@StewartEntertainment.net - Laura is an audio engineer and singer/songwriter from Lima, Peru. Having recently graduated with a dual degree from Berklee College of Music, Laura moved to Nashville, Tennessee in order to fulfill her musical endeavors. With deep passion and commitment to the music industry, she aims to maximize our artists' touring goals and cater to their individual needs. Amongst her musical influences, we can find artists and bands such as; Tyler Childers, Scary Pockets, Fleetwood Mac, Grateful Dead and Dolly Parton.

Woody King: Woody@StewartEntertainment.net - Woody is an avid music enthusiast with experience in arranging, composing, producing, and performing, a wide variety of genres. He also enjoys a good tennis match, playing chess, and hanging out with kitties in his free time. His favorite bands at the moment are The String Cheese Incident, Return to Forever, Phish, Jean Luc Ponty, Gorillaz, Cory Wong & the Wongnotes, Steely Dan, Bela Fleck & the Flecktones, Masayoshi Takanaka​

​

Jordan Carroll: - Jordan@StewartEntertainment.net -

With over a decade of experience within the music industry and former international performing artist, Jordan Carroll has a keen eye for a very organized, detailed and successful run of events when it comes to shows, tours and festivals. Currently listening to 1920s blues up into 1960s rock n' roll Jordan finds himself listening to delta blues with artists like Son House, Howlin Wolf, Robert Johnson, Etta James, Elmore James, Otis Redding and many more. Moving up in the years listening to The Doors, Led Zepplin, The Eagles and many singer song-writer material as well. Not to mention his likings to reggae, psychedelic rock and more.

​

​

Brad Stewart: - Brad@StewartEntertainment.net - Business Manager/Personal Manager / President of US & International Touring / Chief Marketing and Business Development Officer / Publisher / Consultant

With nearly 2 decades of experience in booking international touring acts, Stewart has worked with many amazing talents, such as icons Leon Russell and Ten Years After; blues giants Bobby Blue Bland and Walter Trout; jam scene heroes like Marc Ford (former lead guitarist of the Black Crowes), The Heavy Pets, Yo Mama's Big Fat Booty Band, Monophonics, and the Honey Island Swamp Band.

Along the way, Stewart earned a reputation as a professional with integrity, a strong work ethic, and the vision to promote a positive evolution of change in booking operations. Since Brad started as a hard-core music fan, the very foundation of Stewart Entertainment is based on his empathy for artists and his assistance for them to flourish. He was exposed to all types of roots and rock music while growing up in Mississippi and understood early on that music exerts a strong gravitational pull.

Armed with a degree in marketing, he moved to Charlotte, NC, scouring the landscape for a music business position that would allow him to work with, and for artists in a meaningful way. He found that at Intrepid Artists. “I took on a lot of responsibility very quickly, handling booking for a large roster of artists in the northeast United States and Canada. Ultimately he became steeped in every aspect of the business. Nashville’s burgeoning music scene dictated Stewart’s move from Charlotte and makes Music City the perfect home for Stewart Entertainment, LLC. “I see a tremendous opportunity today for artists who have trustworthy human resources in place.”
